data store like everything the thing that I had to query was the same thing that was serving Twitter which by the

off-peak as low usage as the time as we had and do the sequel query and like
watch the rest of the servers across Twitter and make sure that I wasn't

to change as that role change right as an individual contributor writing code

job is to be the voice of the customer you're supposed to be thinking about what jobs your product is hired for like

at least was because I knew how the system's worked I would sort of short-circuit certain ideas because I

use that part of my brain or part of my history because it's way better you can think about what problem you're trying
